Parameter BasicToken.balanceOf(address)._owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CNDT.sol#95) is not in mixedCase
Parameter CNDT.transfer(address,uint256)._to (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CNDT.sol#181) is not in mixedCase
Parameter CNDT.transfer(address,uint256)._value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CNDT.sol#181) is not in mixedCase

CNDT.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CNDT.sol#173-179) uses literals with too many digits:
	- totalSupply = 2000000000 * (10 ** decimals) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CNDT.sol#174)
detectors.markdown:
[CNDT.constructor()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CNDT.sol#L173-L179) uses literals with too many digits:
	- [totalSupply = 2000000000 * (10 ** decimals)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CNDT.sol#L174)

detectors.description:
balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Basic.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CNDT.sol#65)
	- BasicToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CNDT.sol#95-97)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- StandardToken.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CNDT.sol#156-158)
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CNDT.sol#102)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CNDT.sol#104)
	- StandardToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CNDT.sol#137-148)

emergencyERC20Drain(ERC20,uint256) should be declared external:
	- CNDT.emergencyERC20Drain(ERC20,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CNDT.sol#194-196)

mint(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- CNDT.mint(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CNDT.sol#198-203)
